sections.heading: Department; accredit private postsecondary career school; when
sections.text: The department may accredit a private postsecondary career school when the school has met the minimum standards specified in the rules and regulations of the department.SourceLaws 1977, LB 486, ยง 19;Laws 1990, LB 488, ยง 18;R.S.1943, (199
